Build Status:

Source Code

If you want to download as source code, clone the repository.

Binaries

Download the latest artifacts from the Build Server

Maven and Gradle

Spek has not been released yet and as such is not made available on Maven Central. However you can download it from the JetBrains Artifactory.

To use it in Maven:

<dependency>
    <groupId>org</groupId>
    <artifactId>spek</artifactId>
    <version>0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <type>.xml</type>
</dependency>

To use it in Gradle

compile(group: 'org', name: 'spek', version: '0.1-SNAPSHOT', ext: '.xml')
